Module ParenteVenturini

Package it.polimi.ingsw.ParenteVenturini.Network.Server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ServerMessageHandler  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardSetupHandler
    class used to handle the phase in which challenger choose the possible cards and players can choose their card
    ClientController
    this controller controls a single client connected
    ClientThreadFromServer
    thread generated from the server to handle single client requests
    GameController
    this class controls the conduct of the game
    GameDispatcher
    Singleton class that handle the creation of new games, keeping track of active games
    MoveHandler
    this class handle the moves during the game
    PlaceWorkerSetupHandler
    this class handle the setup phase in which each player place two workers
    Server
    server class, handle teh connection of new clients
